Package com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF

Class Account

java.lang.Object
com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.dbjson.Serializable
com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Serializable>
public class Account extends Serializable
The Account class represents an account containing information such as name, email, password, associated company (if any), and balance. It also provides methods for validation, top-up, and payment. Extends the Serializable class for serialization purposes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Raihan Muhammad Ihsan

    • topUp

      public boolean topUp(double amount)
      Adds a specified amount to the account balance.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to be added to the balance.
      Returns:
      True if the top-up is successful; false if the amount is not positive.
